headline: Berkshire Hathaway: What Warren Buffett is buying and selling
summary: Catalysts host Seana Smith analyzes Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (BRK-A, BRK-B) portfolio adjustments, examining the company's stock purchases and sales in the fourth quarter of 2024. This comes as investors await Berkshire's annual letter to shareholders. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here. This post was written by Angel Smith

headline: Constellation invests in functional nonalcoholic cocktail brand Hiyo
summary: The brand, which contains ingredients like ashwagandha, has gained traction in the growing alcohol-free category as consumers push for more better-for-you options.

headline: A Lesson From Buffett's Purchase Of Constellation Brands Shares
summary: Constellation Brands and Diageo are major players, but Warren Buffett chose STZ over DEO. See why STZ stock could be a more attractive investment than DEO stock.
